name: Parsleyed Potatoes
keywords: fall, olive oil, parsley, potato, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 18 very small red new potates, scrubbed
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the potatoes until tender, about 20 minutes. Place in a bowl, and toss with the olive oil, parsley, salt and pepper.
